title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, March 27, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss describes to his wife a Sunday in camp, commenting extensively on the preaching. He discusses his brother's success in selling a farm, and gives advice to his wife on cultivating relationships with some new neighbors.
keywords: Church/Religious Activity, Military Authority, Patriotism, Agriculture, Home Front, Family, Women, Camp Life, American Civil War
